issue.title: [CF 1590] Figure out an elegant way to provide scripted access to an Icon's Group
issue.body:
Currently when using LUA notifications, we only gain access to the current icon, which means we have very little ways to tweak it's appearance using scripting (mostly only things available via Icon:SetInfo).

 

It would be great if we could allow access to the group as well (maybe as icon.Group?)

 

There are some very cool stuff that you can do once you allow that behavior. 

 


> Posted by CurseForge user ariehg | Imported from CurseForge issue #1590 | Raw

comments.body:
